```yaml
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Weather Forecast API
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: /
paths:
  /WeatherForecast:
    get:
      operationId: GetWeatherForecast
      summary: Retrieve a list of weather forecasts
      tags:
        - WeatherForecast
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A list of weather forecasts
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/WeatherForecast'
components:
  schemas:
    WeatherForecast:
      type: object
      properties:
        date:
          type: string
          format: date
          description: The date of the forecast
        temperatureC:
          type: integer
          description: The temperature in Celsius
        summary:
          type: string
          description: A summary of the weather
```
ground_truth:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Weather Forecast API
  version: '1.0.0'
servers:
  - url: 'http://localhost:5000'
paths:
  /WeatherForecast:
    get:
      summary: Get weather forecast
      operationId: GetWeatherForecast
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successfully retrieved weather forecast
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/WeatherForecast'
components:
  schemas:
    WeatherForecast:
      type: object
      properties:
        date:
          type: string
          format: date
          description: Date of the forecast
        temperatureC:
          type: integer
          description: Temperature in Celsius
        summary:
          type: string
          description: Weather summary
      required:
        - date
        - temperatureC
        - summary

response:
```yaml
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Pets API
  version: 1.0.0
  description: A simple API to manage pets.
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:3000
paths:
  /api/pets:
    get:
      summary: Get all pets
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A list of pets.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: integer
                    name:
                      type: string
                    type:
                      type: string
    post:
      summary: Add a new pet
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
                type:
                  type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The newly created pet.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: integer
                  name:
                    type: string
                  type:
                    type: string
  /api/pets/{id}:
    get:
      summary: Get a pet by ID
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The pet with the given ID.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: integer
                  name:
                    type: string
                  type:
                    type: string
        '404':
          description: Pet not found.
    put:
      summary: Update a pet by ID
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
                type:
                  type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The updated pet.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: integer
                  name:
                    type: string
                  type:
                    type: string
        '404':
          description: Pet not found.
    delete:
      summary: Delete a pet by ID
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The deleted pet.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: integer
                  name:
                    type: string
                  type:
                    type: string
        '404':
          description: Pet not found.
```
ground_truth:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Pets API
  version: '1.0.0'
servers:
  - url: 'http://localhost:3000'
paths:
  /api/pets:
    get:
      summary: Get all pets
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Pet'
    post:
      summary: Create a new pet
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Pet'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Pet created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Pet'
  /api/pets/{id}:
    get:
      summary: Get pet by ID
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Pet'
        '404':
          description: Pet not found
    put:
      summary: Update pet by ID
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Pet'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Pet updated
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Pet'
        '404':
          description: Pet not found
    delete:
      summary: Delete pet by ID
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Pet deleted
        '404':
          description: Pet not found
components:
  schemas:
    Pet:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
        name:
          type: string
        type:
          type: string
      required:
        - name
        - type

response:
```yaml
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Flask REST API
  description: A simple Flask RESTful API
  version: "1.0.0"
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:5000
paths:
  /:
    get:
      summary: Get a greeting message
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A greeting message
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    example: hello world
    post:
      summary: Post some data
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              additionalProperties: true
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Data received successfully
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: object
                    additionalProperties: true
  /square/{num}:
    get:
      summary: Get the square of a number
      parameters:
        - name: num
          in: path
          required: true
          description: The number to square
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The square of the number
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  square:
                    type: integer
                    example: 4
```
ground_truth:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: API Specification
  version: '1.0.0'
servers:
  - url: 'http://localhost:5000'
paths:
  '/':
    get:
      summary: Return greeting message
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    example: 'hello world'
    post:
      summary: Receive and return submitted data
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Data received
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: object
  '/square/{num}':
    get:
      summary: Return the square of the specified number
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: num
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  square:
                    type: integer
